TopicTitle: (1.0.4 Compatible) SSP: Space Shuttle Program (On Hold for Internal Reorganization)

Articles.Content:
Okay.

Quite honestly, this and the addons page seem very disorganized to me, if you need organization, pm me sampa. Right now this seems very inefficient and cannot last.
We are still working on it and I am already a little concerned about it.
Let me help. I have the ability.

my addons page was designed to take the mess away from this page. I don't mind the picture and idea spamming there

- - - Updated - - -

Mike, don't stop working on this again, please.

Whatever happened to daedalus and pr?
Okay.but still please keep the animosity out of this page
Just a friendly reminder to stay on topic and refrain from insulting others.

Mike or any one here can some one help me to stabilize my Kerbel Game..

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/96035968/Screenshot%202015-09-17%2022.13.20.png

this is a screen shot from the mods i have + ISS+Space Shuttel.. Dont know why my game Crashing when lunching ..

really dont know i was hoping that all my problems is solved after 1.04 but still ..

thanx in advance

Looks like out of memory (ram) try make a seperate install for just the iss and shuttle and one for other non realistic ksp if a computer upgrade is too expensive.

Or try remove one at a time until it works for you

Mike or any one here can some one help me to stabilize my Kerbel Game..

Just a friendly reminder to stay on topic and refrain from insulting others.

Thanks for the heads up, Navy!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84203-Less-memory-usage-by-using-OpenGL

Gow to opengl

This shuttle will be relieved of duty once the all new one comes into action.

You wont want to go back to the old one, unless your computer is made of potato.

It will be revealed closer to release date
Mike, as the director, should I not have been informed of this?
And could you send me the new shuttle, to test?

I think since its not in ksp yet I can keep it to myself for now. Not until I have had a think about what im doing with it and a discussion with Jeast for different reasons.

When I get to the final stage we can do some tests and whatnot.

For now we will keep up with this model that is claimed by many people. I think we can keep it going and not replace it. Just have a newer one. Fresh start, new model for people to fight over if I leave ksp modding

if I leave ksp modding

Which you hopefully will not be doing anythime soon.

Which you hopefully will not be doing anythime soon.

My thoughts exactly.

feel free to help out by sending through to my PM any pics or whatever of specific things you would like to see modelled onto the newer orbiter. Details small or large. Im not too experienced with shuttle knowledge. Shame I havent had the chance to see them in RL before.

I have got a few images of the orbiter at ksc so far (so awesome). Looking for more

feel free to help out by sending through to my PM any pics or whatever of specific things you would like to see modelled onto the newer orbiter. Details small or large. Im not too experienced with shuttle knowledge. Shame I havent had the chance to see them in RL before.

I have got a few images of the orbiter at ksc so far (so awesome). Looking for more

For some reason, i feel like i'm getting left out of the loop.

You do have the latest version right? And stock or Realism overhaul, I dont remember if I asked.

Also have you installed rcsFX mod? Comes with download.

Sampa, can you ask around to see if we need adjustments to reaction torque and who isnt getting rcs.

It is an infernal robotics part, if you remembered to install the,infernal robotics file provided in the download, you should be able to move it. Mike, anything else i'm missing?

That's just it, there wasn't an IR file in the shuttle download...I did, however, download IR and it works now
thanks. must have overlooked it. will be sure to update the download
Ok, Who needs to have their RCS fixed?

Ok, Who needs to have their RCS fixed?

I meant with the team, to run tests in stock/ro...
